attributes.additional_details:
The cost of living is rising for every household in the uk currently. The decision for many to either put fuel in the car or food on the table is a decision no household should have to make. The government should look at rasing the money earned from other areas. Such as a rise in green tax for big business, or a Robin Hood style tax on the rich. 

With countless families slipping below the poverty line the ability to afford there heating bill would be one less issue for the future aswell.
attributes.background: Cut fuel duty to lower the price of petrol  diesel and other fuels primarily used to heat homes and for transport.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
